name: SHCustomCatalog
desc: An object for storing the reference signatures for custom audio recordings and their associated metadata.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new custom catalog object for storing reference audio signatures and their associated metadata.

items.name: func addReferenceSignature(SHSignature, representing: [SHMediaItem])
items.desc: Adds a reference signature and its associated metadata to a catalog.

items.name: func add(from: URL)
items.desc: Loads a saved custom catalog from a file.

items.name: func write(to: URL)
items.desc: Saves the custom catalog to a local file.
